dmca.title: [AB-C145589H] issue copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Thursday, July 13, 2006 6:57 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [AB-C145589H] issue copyright Subject: [AB-C145589H] issue copyright From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [AB-C145589H] issue copyright Reference: [AB-C145589H] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. issue copyright Added by system at Thursday, Jul 13 2006 12:37 am X-MailFrom: showarabic@hotmail.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ;
